categories.name: Accessories
categories.description: Whether your favorite cable has worn out or you need a snazzy new strap, Reverb has all of the accessories you could ever need to deck out your gear or rig. Hundreds of listings are posted on Reverb daily for brand new cables, strings, picks, cases, gig bags, straps, and a whole host of other music gear accessories.

subcategories.name: Case Candy
subcategories.description: Case candy, for the uninitiated, is the endearing name given to all the documentation and goodies that come with a new instrument inside the pocket or storage of the case. This includes repair manuals, certificates of authenticity, marketing materials and more. Why would you want to buy this without the actual instrument? Well, sentimentality and brand fetishism are powerful things. We salute the efforts to keep these artifacts intact and appreciated.

subcategories.name: Straps
subcategories.description: Find guitar straps made of leather, reclaimed material, and all sorts of other cool instrument straps at great prices.

categories.name: Acoustic Guitars
categories.description: Find deals on new, used and vintage acoustic guitars in our constantly-growing collection. From Martin and Gibson to Taylor, Takamine, and more, the acoustic guitar you've been looking for is out there, whether it's just for travel or for professional performance. Browse hundreds of listings or sell your own acoustic guitar.

categories.name: Amps
categories.description: Reverb has a wide array of new and used amps for sale. From electric guitar amplifiers to acoustic amps, bass combos to keyboard amps, vintage amps and everything in between – Reverb has the gear you need to turn up the volume. Interested in selling an amp on Reverb? Read our How To Ship an Amp article before you get started.

subcategories.name: Boutique Amps
subcategories.description: At Reverb, we love boutique amps. Why? Because they really do sound incredible. Boutique amp builders are known for being meticulous about the components they use and the quality of their craftsmanship. Sure, it can be more expensive to choose a handmade boutique amp. But between the amazing tone and the outstanding resale value, we think they're well worth the investment.

subcategories.name: Acoustic Amps
subcategories.description: Amps to liven up your acoustic tones. Great for coffee-shops, small gigs and jam sessions.

categories.name: Band and Orchestra
categories.description: Students and symphony-members alike could always use new or upgraded instruments. The world of band and orchestra instruments on Reverb is growing swiftly by the day, so if you need a new violin or flute, keep an eye on this expanding collection. If you're on the hunt for a new band or orchestra instrument, the deals we have on violins, trumpets, saxophones, woodwinds, brass, and even more, can't be beat.

categories.name: Bass Guitars
categories.description: Reverb has a huge selection of new and used bass guitars, ranging from upright to acoustic, beginner basses to classic vintage bass guitars. An integral part of many musical ensembles, the bass guitar can function as both a harmonic player and the rhythmic foundation.  Follow this collection to keep up with Reverb’s ever-growing collection of bass guitars.

categories.name: DJ and Lighting Gear
categories.description: It takes a lot to put on a show, and Reverb has all the DJ and lighting gear you could need to keep things running smoothly. DJ gear, from Ableton controllers to turntables, will help you keep your audience enthralled and grooving all night and lighting equipment will make sure you stay in the spotlight. Shop a wide range of DJ and lighting equipment on Reverb - after all, the show must go on, and we've got the gear to keep you covered.

Take a look at used, new and vintage drum sets, full drum kits, snares, cymbals, and more from brands like Zildjian, Ludwig, DW, and all of your favorites.

With popular examples like the ground-breaking Roland V-Drum series as well as more affordable options like the Alesis DM10, there's an electronic kit to match every style and budget.

categories.name: Effects & Pedals
categories.description: Effects and pedals have been at the forefront of innovative tone and sound for decades. If you're looking for a famous Big Muff of any flavor, we've got it. Want a newer boutique pedal like something from Walrus or Strymon? Listings are going up daily. Even if your deepest desire is to shell out for an original Klon Centaur, we've got you covered. Find the best deals on new, used, vintage, and boutique effects pedals. Overdrive pedals, reverb, delay, fuzz, modulation effects, digital multi-effects and more, Reverb has the widest selection of pedals for the best prices.

subcategories.name: Phase Shifters
subcategories.description: Tap into the tone of van halen with phase shifting madness. Classics and new phase shifters from brands like boss for sale.

subcategories.name: Chorus
subcategories.description: Get the sound of '80s with deals on used and new chorus pedals like the small clone, ce-5, and more.

subcategories.name: Tremolo and Vibrato
subcategories.description: Give your tone some warble with used deals on boutique and classic tremolo and vibrato effects.

categories.name: Electric Guitars
categories.description: Electric guitars may be one of the fastest growing categories of instrument on Reverb, with thousands of listings added every day. Browse the tons of listings on used, vintage and rare electric guitars and you're sure to find what you're looking for. We've got great buys on used Fender, Gibson, Rickenbacker, Ibanez electric guitars, as well as tons of other brands. Take a look and find the electric guitar that will give you your signature sound.

subcategories.name: 12-String
subcategories.description: When the time comes to add a little more sound to your electric guitar playing, it's not all about pedals. Try a 12-string electric guitar and channel the '60s jangle of the Beatles and the Byrds '60s jangle or the alternative sounds of Peter Buck of R.E.M. Popular 12-string electrics include several Rickenbacker options like the 360-12 but there are also many 12-string guitars from Gibson, Guild and Fender like the Strat-like Fender XII. Whichever style suits you best, check back here from the best deals on new, used and vintage 12 string electric guitars on Reverb.

subcategories.name: Vintage (pre-1980)
subcategories.description: Is older always better? The jury is still out on that one, but we're fairly certain that nothing looks or feels quite like an aged, decades old guitar. From the most valuable collector-grade vintage icons to player-grade workhorses on their tenth owner, Reverb has it all. Looking for a '70s era Deluxe Telecaster? A pristine original '50s Les Paul goldtop? A beat up, modified and repaired pre-CBS Fender that's now financially within reach? It doesn't matter whether you're looking for ultra clean rare specimens or just trying to score a deal on a project guitar. No matter what you find here, every guitar will have a story.

categories.name: Folk Instruments
categories.description: Folk instruments cover such a wide swath of the genealogy of instruments. World instruments, historical instruments, and instruments integral to various cultures all may fall under this category. Here at Reverb, we celebrate the variety of folk instruments listed on the site, from banjos and mandolins to ukuleles and accordions, not to mention the dozens of other individual instruments that fall under the 'folk instrument' category. Find the best deals on these and more in our folk instrument collection.

categories.name: Home Audio
categories.description: We understand the needs of avid musicians and listeners - you want your home audio equipment to be top notch so that you can hear or play back every solo, every lyric, every note in the highest fidelity. Check out our collection of home audio equipment, like turntables, receivers, speakers, headphones, and more, so you can listen to all of your favorite music in crystal clear detail.

categories.name: Keyboards
categories.description: Nowadays, keyboards are so much more than just ivory keys. We have analog synths, digital synths, MIDI controllers, electronic keyboards, rackmount synths, and a whole host of other keyboard-like instruments. Find incredible deals on used, vintage, and new synthesizers, workstations, and more from iconic names like Moog, Korg, Roland, and classic brands.

categories.name: Parts
categories.description: Parts can be used to upgrade your guitar or other instruments, or to build something entirely new! Play Dr. Frankenstein and whip yourself up a Partscaster or purchase parts to give some TLC to that old synth you have sitting in your basement. Find the right parts, from pickups to bridges to pickguards and more on Reverb.

subcategories.name: Necks
subcategories.description: Whether you are building a guitar from scratch, modifying a forgotten player's instrument or remedying a casualty of trauma or time, you need a neck. They are crucial components that can make or break your guitar. From intonation to playability to vibe, the neck is arguably second only to pickups in terms of the overall effect on your instrument. From fat, baseball bat-like vintage cuts to modern compound radius geometry, naturally aged backs to purposely sanded and oiled backs, we have a plethora to choose from on Reverb.

subcategories.name: Bridges
subcategories.description: Aside from your fingers, nothing has as much of an effect on intonation than your instrument's bridge. Whether you're looking for a hardtail, a wraparound or a Bigsby-friendly roller bridge, vintage original or aftermarket modified, we have a huge selection of bridges on Reverb to help you repair your vintage axe, hot rod your workhorse or finish your hand-built creation.

subcategories.name: Tailpieces
subcategories.description: For some guitars, things are sexier on the other side of the bridge. For guitars that need (or want) a tailpiece, the options are endless, from classic lyre and trapeze tailpieces to trusty Bigsby units and even ornate carved wood pieces fit for archtops, there is a wide variety of ways to wrap the bottom bout of your guitar on Reverb.

subcategories.name: Bass Guitar Parts
subcategories.description: Kick your bass up a notch with deals on pickups, bridges, tuners, pickguards and other bass parts.

subcategories.name: Guitar Pickups
subcategories.description: No matter what your tone, we've got deals on humbuckers, single-coils and active pickups from seymour duncan, dimarzio, emg and more.

subcategories.name: Vintage (pre-1980)
subcategories.description: Find the exact part you need for your vintage guitar or project. Vintage parts for fender, gibson, martin and more.

subcategories.name: Acoustic Pickups
subcategories.description: Amplify your acoustic tones with used and new pickups. Soundhole pickups, undersaddle and more.

categories.name: Pro-Audio
categories.description: Looking for monster deals on speakers, mics, recording gear, and other pro audio equipment? Check out new and used pro audio gear on Reverb, suited to bedroom producers and professional studios alike.

subcategories.name: DI Boxes
subcategories.description: Keep everything nice in level with a solid DI Box. Find great deals on used and new DI boxes here.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Everything else musical you could ever imagine found here. Find great deals on cables, cases, straps, and more.
